Call of Duty 2019
results.deck: Infinity Ward's 2019 reboot of the Modern Warfare franchise.
results.description:
Overview

Call of Duty: Modern Warfare (not to be confused with Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare) is a modern-military first-person shooter developed by Infinity Ward and published by Activision for the Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and PC (digitally via Battle.net) on October 25, 2019.

The fifteenth installment of the Call of Duty franchise, Modern Warfare is a reboot of the studio's earlier sub-series of the same name and brings characters and themes from the series into a modern perspective.

The main story is set in 2019, involving the fictional Russian-occupied country of Urzikstan. The game follows two groups of protagonists: the Urzikstan Liberation Force (including C.I.A. Operative "Alex" and Commander Farah Karim) and the Special Air Service (including Sergeant Kyle Garrick and Captain John Price) as they investigate the whereabouts of stolen shipments of a dangerous chemical gas by the terrorist organization Al-Qatala. Both Alex and Garrick are playable characters, with Farah playable in flashbacks.

Along with a traditional campaign and a co-operative Special Ops mode, the game builds on the series's standard multiplayer component by allowing cross-platform multiplayer (the first in the series to do so), adding more robust weapon augmentation, and introducing new game modes (including the competitive 2v2 mode Gunfight and the large-scale 32v32 mode Ground War).

On March 10, 2020, the game received two massive-scale game modes (Battle Royale and Plunder) that were also released as a separate free-to-play product (as Call of Duty: Warzone). Playing similarly to the "Blackout" mode on Call of Duty: Black Ops 4, up to 150 players (in squads with up to three players) can maneuver around a massive-scale map ("Verdansk") in order to either be the last squad standing (Battle Royale) or collect as many Cash as possible from opposing players and loot boxes (Plunder).

The game received three public pre-release testing phases, each restricted to a specific weekend: August 19th for the "2v2 Alpha" (restricted to the PS4 version and the new Gunfight game mode), September 14th for the "PlayStation 4 Exclusive Open Beta", and September 21st for the "Open Beta".
results.name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare

results.deck: The 17th installment of the Call of Duty series brings the Black Ops sub-franchise back to its 20th-century Cold War roots.
results.description:
Overview

Call of Duty: Black Ops - Cold War is a first-person shooter developed by both Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision for the Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and PC on November 13, 2020.

The game had additional development by High Moon Studios, Beenox, Activision Shanghai, and Sledgehammer Games.

The seventeenth main installment of the Call of Duty series (and the fifth main installment of the Black Ops sub-series), Cold War brings the Black Ops series back to its 20th century Cold War roots. It is the first in the series developed for ninth-generation video game consoles.

Story

The main story is set between the events of Call of Duty: Black Ops and Call of Duty: Black Ops II, putting players in the role of a customizable CIA agent, known only by their codename "Bell", in the year 1981. Led by Special Officer Russell Adler, and aided by some of the main characters from the series (including Alex Mason and Frank Woods), Bell is tasked with hunting down a spy known as "Perseus", who had infiltrated a top-secret US program known as Operation Greenlight.

Gameplay

Along with the traditional single-player campaign, the game features updated competitive multiplayer and co-operative Zombies modes. Both modes share the same character customization, as the Zombies mode now takes place in the same timeframe as the Multiplayer mode (with player Operators recruited to a CIA response team known as "Requiem"). While the "Blackout" survival-shooter mode does not make a return, the game features a new large-scale mode known as "Fireteam" (which splits the 40-player server into four-man teams).

Along with cross-platform multiplayer and player progression, the game boasts being the first in the series to feature "cross-generational multiplayer" (as PS5 and Xbox Series players can play with PS4 and XONE players). The progression system also ties with Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, allowing players to level up by playing on Modern Warfare, Warzone, or Cold War.
results.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops - Cold War
